channel.title: 718 matrix cant buy items from shops?
channel.description: Alright well i downlaoded the newley made matrix source the other day and completely re did everything... added drop editors, item packers, etc.. before and after all my changes i still cant buy items from ANY shops including the original shops like general, arrows, fish market, etc... i can trade them but cant buy from them. any ideas? anything helps thanks!

item.title: 718 matrix cant buy items from shops?
item.dc:creator: @robutdude91 robutdude91
item.description:
@robutdude91 wrote:

You need to setup the new shop configs. Someone is posting and updating the shop configs on rune-server.

Not 100% done but does the job.

Read full topic
item.source: 718 matrix cant buy items from shops?
